duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and maintain a 24/7 broadcast operations center for NBC Sports.
Develop and implement standard operation procedures for all transmission technologies activities.
Maintain the transmission and communication systems to ensure maximum reliability for all live sports productions.
Provide expert level system support and on-site coverage (troubleshooting, upgrades, expansions) of all the tele-production systems.
Lead the procurement, installation, and commissioning of new systems, including training of the engineering team and operation technicians.
Assist in the development of the business’ technology strategies, capital/operating plans, and management of multiple projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related technical field (Master's preferred)
